definition: AWARENESS OF THE OPERATIONS, CAPABILITIES, AND APPLICATION OF COMPUTERS SUFFICIENT FOR AN INDIVIDUAL TO FUNCTION IN SOCIETY AND THE WORKPLACE
A SET OF MORAL OBLIGATIONS, VALUES AND CODES OF CONDUCT AGREED BY MEMBERS OF A PARTICULAR PROFESSION AND ADHERED TO DURING THE COURSE OF THEIR WORK
A NATURAL BODY OF RUNNING WATER THAT FLOWS ALONG A CHANNEL
THE MANNER, PURPOSE, FREQUENCY, ETC., OF READERS' USE OF BOOKS
WORK CARRIED OUT BY CHILDREN OF SCHOOL AGE, USUALLY PART-TIME

CONTRACT UNDER WHICH AN OWNER OF PROPERTY GRANTS ANOTHER PERSON EXCLUSIVE POSSESSION OF THE PROPERTY FOR AN AGREED PERIOD, USUALLY IN RETURN FOR RENT AND SOMETIMES FOR A CAPITAL SUM KNOWN AS A PREMIUM
AN INDIVIDUAL'S PERCEPTION OF THEIR CONTROL OVER EVENTS AND OUTCOMES AS DETERMINED INTERNALLY BY THEIR OWN BEHAVIOUR VS. FATE, LUCK, OR EXTERNAL CIRCUMSTANCES

BEHAVIOURAL MANIFESTATIONS OF CEREBRAL DOMINANCE IN WHICH THERE IS PREFERENTIAL USE AND SUPERIOR FUNCTIONING OF EITHER THE LEFT OR THE RIGHT SIDE, AS IN THE PREFERRED USE OF THE RIGHT HAND OR RIGHT FOOT
LONG-LASTING, AFFECTIVE AND PSYCHOLOGICAL IDENTIFICATION WITH A SPECIFIC POLITICAL PARTY.
CARE PROVIDED DURING PREGNANCY.

ISSUES THAT ARE IMPORTANT TO CITIZENS, OFTEN DEBATED IN PUBLIC, AND WHICH MAY REQUIRE ACTION OR POLICY CHANGES ON THE PART OF THE NATIONAL OR LOCAL GOVERNMENT. THE ISSUES MAY OR MAY NOT INFLUENCE VOTING.
THE PRACTICE OF ALTERNATING BETWEEN WORKING IN THE WORKPLACE AND IN OTHER AGREED LOCATIONS INCLUDING HOME
INDIVIDUALS WITH COMMON CULTURAL INTERESTS BROUGHT TOGETHER FOR THEIR MUTUAL BENEFIT
THE AGE AT WHICH A PERSON CAN LEGALLY CARRY OUT CERTAIN ACTIONS, E.G. LEAVING HOME, BUYING ALCOHOL OR CIGARETTES, DRIVING A CAR, GETTING MARRIED
PERSONS WHO ARE NOT MARRIED OR IN A CIVIL PARTNERSHIP, OR INVOLVED IN A STEADY RELATIONSHIP
EDUCATION LEADING TO POST-SECONDARY QUALIFICATIONS AND/OR PREPARATION FOR CAREERS IN HEALTH PROFESSIONS
STOPPING THE HABIT OF SMOKING; AIDS USED TO STOP SMOKING

ISCED LEVEL 3. THIS LEVEL OF EDUCATION TYPICALLY BEGINS AT THE END OF FULL-TIME COMPULSORY EDUCATION WITH A TYPICAL ENTRANCE AGE OF 15 OR 16 YEARS. MINIMUM ENTRANCE REQUIREMENTS ARE THE COMPLETION OF LEVEL 2 EDUCATION OR DEMONSTRABLE ABILITY TO HANDLE PROGRAMMES AT THIS LEVEL.
PAID FULL-TIME OFFICIALS OF THE UNION OR EMPLOYEES WHO HAVE BEEN APPOINTED BY THE UNION TO REPRESENT ITS MEMBERS IN THE WORKPLACE
DISTURBANCES IN THE MENTAL PROCESSES THAT ARE RELATED TO THINKING, REASONING, AND JUDGMENT
TECHNIQUES OF ECONOMICS APPLIED TO EDUCATIONAL SYSTEMS
PRODUCTION BY MACHINERY, USUALLY COMPUTER-CONTROLLED, WITHOUT THE NEED FOR IMMEDIATE HUMAN INTERVENTION
RADIO OR TELEVISION BROADCASTING PERFORMED OUTSIDE A COUNTRY'S BORDERS

LEARNING ACTIVITIES, CURRICULUM AND/OR EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMMES, AT ANY EDUCATIONAL LEVEL, CONCERNED WITH THE RIGHTS AND RESPONSIBILITIES OF CITIZENSHIP - THE PURPOSE OF WHICH IS TO PROMOTE KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ATTITUDES CONDUCIVE TO EFFECTIVE PARTICIPATION IN CIVIC AND NATIONAL LIFE.
THIS TERM INCLUDES DRUG PRESCRIPTIONS AND NON-DRUG PRESCRIPTIONS.
THE STATE OF HEALTH OF THE MOUTH
THE PHYSICAL STRUCTURES PROVIDED FOR THE BENEFIT OF TOURISTS, SUCH AS GIFT SHOPS, TOILETS AND ACCOMMODATION
THE DYNAMICS OF INTERPERSONAL INTERACTION BETWEEN MEMBERS OF A FAMILY UNIT
A DIRECT VOTE WHERE THE ENTIRE ELECTORATE OF A COUNTRY IS ASKED TO VOTE ON A SPECIFIC PROPOSAL OR ISSUE.
INCIDENTS WHERE UNAUTHORIZED PERSONS GAIN ACCESS TO DATA

relationships.target: DISCRIMINATION ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION

definition: A COUNTRY'S INTERMEDIATE ADMINISTRATIVE UNITS
A WRITTEN PUBLIC DECLARATION OF POLICIES, INTENTIONS, OPINIONS OR MOTIVES, ESPECIALLY ONE PRODUCED BY A POLITICAL PARTY OR CANDIDATE
ACT OR PRACTICE OF OBTAINING SOMETHING, ESPECIALLY MONEY OR OTHER VALUABLE PROPERTY, FROM AN UNWILLING PERSON BY PHYSICAL FORCE, INTIMIDATION OR ABUSE OF AUTHORITY
NUMBER OF MARRIAGES IN A GIVEN PERIOD
ACTION TO MAINTAIN THE BEST POSSIBLE HEALTH AND QUALITY OF LIFE OF THE MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY AND TO ENCOURAGE THEIR INVOLVEMENT IN THEIR PERSONAL HEALTH
THE PROCESS OF DEVELOPING THE BODILY VIGOUR AND ENDURANCE BY SYSTEMATIC DIET AND EXERCISE, SO AS TO FIT FOR SOME ATHLETIC FEAT
THIS TERM REFERS TO THE ALLOCATION OF AN INDIVIDUAL WHO HAS A PAID JOB TO ONE OF A SET OF CATEGORIES INDICATING THEIR RELATION TO THE MEANS OF PRODUCTION AND POSITION IN THE WORKPLACE HIERARCHY.
THE AGE OF COMMENCEMENT OF COMPULSORY EDUCATION; THE ACTUAL AGE AT WHICH A CHILD STARTS SCHOOL
A CALL OR CITATION BY AUTHORITY TO APPEAR BEFORE A COURT OR JUDICIAL OFFICER
THE NUMBER OF LIVE BIRTHS PER 1000 WOMEN OF REPRODUCTIVE AGE IN A POPULATION PER YEAR.
VISUAL SIGNS USED BY A BUSINESS ENTERPRISE TO IDENTIFY ITS GOODS. THEY ARE ALSO USED TO DISTINGUISH A PARTICULAR BUSINESS'S GOODS FROM ALL OTHER GOODS.
AN ORGANIZATION THAT EXISTS PURELY FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES. IN SOME COUNTRIES SUCH ORGANIZATIONS NEED TO REGISTER WITH THE GOVERNMENT, AND ARE ENTITLED TO TAX ADVANTAGES.
A BODY OF PERSONS WHO HAVE COMBINED TO EXECUTE A COMMON PURPOSE OR ADVANCE A COMMON CAUSE; TYPICALLY, BUT NOT NECESSARILY, GOVERNED BY A COMMITTEE DRAWN FROM THE MEMBERSHIP
